meanings.definition: Relating to the system or procedure of assigning names to organisms or things.
meanings.sent1: The nomenclatural process helped scientists classify the new species.
meanings.sent2: The nomenclatural rules ensure each organism has a unique name.
meanings.sent3: The nomenclatural debate over the creature's name was surprisingly intense.
meanings.sent4: Her nomenclatural skills were so precise, she could name any plant instantly.
meanings.sent5: The nomenclatural system made learning about animals more organized and clear.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the act of naming or designating.
meanings.sent1: His nomenclatural abilities made him the go-to person for naming projects.
meanings.sent2: The nomenclatural ceremony was a formal event to name the new building.
meanings.sent3: She had a nomenclatural talent for coming up with creative names for pets.
meanings.sent4: The nomenclatural process of choosing a name for the company was challenging.
meanings.sent5: The nomenclatural task of naming stars was both exciting and important.
